import "./messenger.css" import Topbar from "../../components/topbar/Topbar" import Conversation from "../../components/conversation/Conversation" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" import { Tune } from "@mui/icons-material" import ChatOnline from "../../components/chatOnline/ChatOnline" import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext" export default function Messenger() { const [conversation, setConversation] = useState([]); const { user } = useContext(AuthContext); useEffect(() => { const getConversation = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get("/conversation/" + user._id); lo } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } },) return ( <>
) }
